name: Bungle Color Theme
description: A CSS Style for Bungleboards featuring a different array of colors and a different font face. Work on this project has been completed, or rather dropped, by disinterest. It is nonetheless supposedly fully functional, however, so feel free to use it as you'd like and contact me if you have any issues.
additional_info:
* Changed the blue background to a less drab shade
+ Added Scrollbar colors
+ Got disinterested by the design and dropped the project
